## Description {#details}

<a href="/docs/api/classes/llvm/metadata">Metadata</a> to speed allocatability test.

Keeps track of the number of infinities in each row and column.

Definition at line 53 of file <a href="/docs/api/files/include/include/llvm/include/llvm/codegen/regallocpbqp-h">RegAllocPBQP.h</a>.
